title: Win Hot Tub Time Machine 2 on DVD
content:
When Lou finds himself in trouble, Nick and Jacob fire up the hot tub time machine in an attempt to get back to the past. But they inadvertently land in the future with Adam Jr. Now they have to alter the future in order to save the past – which is really the present. 
 

 
Hot Tub Time Machine 2  Reviews 
 
“Hot Tub Time Machine 2 is basically a sillier version of an already silly concept – but that doesn’t mean it isn’t fun.’  – Screenrant 
 
“This no-holds-barred – and unabashedly idiotic – sequel is an improvement over its uneven predecessor, and I’m now convinced a third sequel (and possibly more) could actually happen.”  – Cinemablend 
   
Paramount and Gamefreaks are giving you the chance to win one of five copies of Hot Tub time Machine 2 on DVD – just leave your name and details below to enter. 
  
 Name 
  
 
 Email 
  
 
 Enter  
  
This competition is open to New Zealand residents only. 
You must be aged 16 or over to enter. 
Competition ends Monday 14th of September 2015. 
Multiple entries will result in disqualification. 
By entering you agree to receive our newsletter. 
See our Privacy Policy for terms and conditions.
